items.title: China is leading the fight against hidden car door handles
items.description: The Chinese government issued a new rule that goes into effect January 1, 2027.

items.title: Adobe Animate is shutting down as company focuses on AI
items.description: Adobe Animate will be discontinued on March 1, 2026, as Adobe shifts its focus to AI.

items.title: Two Stanford students launch $2M startup accelerator for students nationwide
items.description: "Breakthrough’s purpose is to fill in the funding and opportunity gap that exists in many of these ecosystems because students have historically lacke...

items.title: What Snowflake’s deal with OpenAI tells us about the enterprise AI race
items.description: Snowflake is the latest enterprise to sign multi-year deals with multiple AI companies in what could be a sign to come of a future trend.

items.title: Firefox will soon let you block all of its generative AI features
items.description: Starting with Firefox 148 arriving later this month, users will find a new AI controls section within the desktop browser settings.
